transliteration.en: dharamarai kee sabhaa jabai dhouoo jai hai(n) ||

verse.gurmukhi: khw bdn lY qw sO auqR idXwie hY ]

bdb.gurmukhi: qw ikhVw mUMh lY ky aus nUM au`qr idAWgy।

transliteration.english: kahaa badhan lai taa sau utr dhiyai hai ||

transliteration.en: kahaa badhan lai taa sau utr dhiyai hai ||

verse.gurmukhi: ien bwqn kO qY iqRX khw ibcwreI ]

bdb.gurmukhi: ienRhw g`lw nUM, hy iesqRI! qUM kI ivcwr kr rhI hYN।

transliteration.english: ein baatan kau tai tiray kahaa bichaariee ||

bdb.gurmukhi: ienRhw g`lw kr ky rwvx dy ds isr gey।
